sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_publications.PublicationsUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>PublicationsUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PublicationsUtil = Class.create();
PublicationsUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    checkApprovalEligibility: function(document_id) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_publications_publication');
        if (gr.canRead() && gr.get(document_id)) {
            var start = (new GlideDateTime(gr.getValue("publish_date"))).getNumericValue();
            var now = new GlideDateTime().getNumericValue();

            if (now >= start) {
				return true;
            }
			else{
				return false;
			}
        }
    },
    type: 'PublicationsUtil'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-03-25 11:57:22</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>a243ca8487aa0910581f0e9d0ebb35fc</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PublicationsUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Targeted Communications" source="sn_publications">0fdd6483d72302004f1e82285e61033a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Targeted Communications">0fdd6483d72302004f1e82285e61033a</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a243ca8487aa0910581f0e9d0ebb35fc</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-03-25 11:57:22</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
